sections.text: Tourism growth was supported by improved transport and government-led tourism programs that made destinations more accessible and visitor-friendly.

items: Expansion of Mumbai and Pune international airports
Improved road and rail connectivity to Konkan, Vidarbha, and Marathwada regions
Government-backed MTDC (Maharashtra Tourism Development Corporation) initiatives and eco-resorts

sections.text: Maharashtra became a pioneer in eco and rural tourism, offering authentic local experiences in tribal and agricultural regions that connect travelers to nature and tradition.

items: Agrotourism in Konkan and Vidarbha regions
Eco-friendly stays near forest reserves and hill areas
Rural tourism showcasing traditional farming, food, and crafts

sections.text: Maharashtra today stands as a vibrant, culturally rich state that continues to welcome the world to explore its legacy, nature, cuisine, and people.
